name: Version 2.5.3 (25 Mär 2022)
body:
# Bugfixes

- Fixed compatibility issue between pylint 2.12 and 2.13 to construct ScopeConsumer tuples correctly depending on version (#358)

# Other

- pylint version is now pinned to <3 to give breathing space to update pylint-django before the major update lands

name: Version 2.5.2 (18 Feb 2022)
body:
# Bugfixes

- Fixed crash with assigning a class to a variable, and referencing the variable when subclassing ([#349](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/349>))

# Other

- CI now tests against Django 4.0

name: Version 2.5.1 (16 Feb 2022)
body:
Bugfix relase:

* Fixed picking for `augment_visit` (see [#276](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/276))

name: Version 2.5.0 (2 Jan 2022)
body:
**Bugfixes**

- Fixed compatability with astroid 2.9.1 (#343)
- 
**New**

- Removed false positive error of missing member in TextChoices tuples #298  (see pulls #330 and #345)
- Moved from Travis CI to GitHub Actions (#336 and #340)
- Added pre-commit configuration and began enforcing black/isort code formatting
- Multiple test fixes (including #338) - newer versions of pylint expect a different format for the expected messages txt files.
- Bumped dependency for pylint-django-utils to get `multi-threaded pylint support (https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-plugin-utils/pull/21)

name: Version 2.4.2 (08 Jan 2021)
body: - Moved `Faker` dependencies to test-only. Closes #304

name: Version 2.4.1 (07 Jan 2021)
body: - Relaxed Faker package versioning requirement for ``Faker`` (Robin Chow)

name: Version 2.4.0 (06 Jan 2021)
body:
- Allowed configuration of the Django settings module to be used via a
  commandline argument `#286 <https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/286>`_
- If Django settings are not specified via a commandline argument or environment
  variable, an error is issued but defaults are loaded from Django, removing the
  fatal error behaviour. `#277 <https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/277>`_
  and `#243 <https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/243>`_
- Fixed tests to work with pylint>2.6
- Fixed ``AttributeError: 'Subscript' object has no attribute 'name'`` error.
  Closes `#284 <https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/284>`_ (@uy-rrodriguez)
- Pin Faker version to Prevent Asteroid Crash (James Pulec)
- Remove Python 3.5 Support (EOL since Sept 2020 and Faker requires 3.6 anyway)
  (James Pulec)
- Fixed reverse manager ``update_or_create`` calls (James Pulec)

name: Version 2.3.0 (05 Aug 2020)
body:
- Improvement in error message for ``missing-backwards-migration-callable``
  (Bryan Mutai)
- Start testing with Django 3.1 on Python 3.8
- Better error message when Django is not configured. Closes #277

name: Version 2.2.0 (22 Jul 2020)
body:
- Rely on Django to resolve string references in ForeignKey fields. Refs #243 (Alejandro Angulo)
- Suppress unused-argument for functions in migration modules. Fix #267
- New checker for hard-coded auth.User. Fix #244

name: Version 2.1.0 (12 Jul 2020)
body:
- New checker to warn about missing backwards data migrations (Bryan Mutai)
- Rename ``pylint_django.checkers.db_performance`` to
  ``pylint_django.checkers.migrations``
- Add URL to project Changelog for PyPI (Ville Skyttä)
- Fix failing test suite b/c of missing CSV dialect. Fix
  `#268 <https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/268>`_
  (Alejandro Angulo)

name: Version 2.0.15 (14 Apr 2020)
body: - Do not report error for ``gettext_lazy`` (Antonin MOREL)

name: Version 2.0.14 (25 Feb 2020)
body:
- Add support for Django 3.0 and Python 3.8 (Wayne Lambert)
- Support ASGI. Fix  #258 (Sander Maijers)

name: Version 2.0.13 (23 Nov 2019)
body:
- Suppress ``too-many-ancestors`` for class-based generic views
- Add ``handler400``, ``handler403``, ``handler404`` to good_names. Fix
  #248

name: Version 2.0.12 (04 Nov 2019)
body:
- Fix too broad suppression of unused-argument warnings for functions and methods where the first argument is named request. Now issues warnings for the rest of the arguments if they are unused. Fix #249 (Pascal Urban)
- Pass arguments of scripts/test.sh to test_func/pytest to ease development (Pascal Urban)
- Document behavior when ForeignKey fields are referenced as strings. Fix #241

name: Version 2.0.11 (10 July 2019)
body: Use `functools.wrap` to preserve `leave_module` info (Mohit Solanki)

name: Version 2.0.10 (07 July 2019), Novi Sad edition
body:
- Suppress ``no-member`` for ``ManyToManyField``. Fix
  [#192](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/192>) and
  [#237](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/237>) (Pierre Chiquet)

- Fix ``UnboundLocalError`` with ``ForeignKey(to=)``. Fix
  [#232](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/232) (Sardorbek Imomaliev)

name: Version 2.0.9 (26 April 2019)
body:
- Fix `UnboundLocalError: local variable 'key_cls' referenced before assignment`
  for cases when models is a python package, the `to` argument is a string
  that is used in this pattern `app.Model` and also there is some other
  `bool` const like `null=True` right after `to`. (Sardorbek Imomaliev)
- Don't crash if ForeignKey field doesn't have keyword arguments Fix
  [#230](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/230)

name: Version 2.0.8 (18 April 2019)
body:
- Support recursive (self) ForeignKey relations. Fix
  [#208](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/208) (Daniil Kharkov)

name: Version 2.0.7 (16 April 2019)
body:
- Fixed ``AstroidImportError`` for ``DecimalField``. Fix
  [#221](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/221) (Daniil Kharkov)
- Add ``load_configuration()`` in ``pylint_django/__init__.py``. Fix
  [#222](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/222)
- Support ForeignKey relations with ``to`` keyword. Fix
  [#223](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/223) (Daniil Kharkov)

name: Version 2.0.5 (17 Dec 2018)
body:
Bumping the version number because there's been a mix-up between
GitHub tags and the versions pushed to PyPI for 2.0.3 and 2.0.4.

Please use 2.0.5 which includes the changes mentioned below!

name: Version 2.0.4 (do not use)
body:
- Avoid traceback with concurrent execution. Fix #197
- Suppress ``no-member`` errors for ``LazyFunction`` in factories
- Suppress ``no-member`` errors for ``RelatedManager`` fields
- Clean up compatibility code: PR #207

name: Version 0.8.1 (14 Dec 2018)
body:
* Backported fix for
  [#120](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint-django/issues/120).

**WARNING:** this release has not been tested via our regular CI process
because the 0.8.x branch is missing lots of internal infrastructure and it
will not be generally supported! This version is provided as a last-resort
measure for users who can't upgrade to the 2.x series! Use at your own risk!
